Breadth-First.Explanation: Systematically listing man-made visual clues without a firm hypothesis, gathering broad information
Continuing divergent clue collection by listing natural elements and environment
Identifying which clues are most distinctive to prepare for hypothesis generation

Depth-First.Explanation: Proposing a specific location hypothesis based on the key clues
Depth-First.KeyElement: Lisbon, Belém (Monument to the Discoveries, 25 de Abril Bridge, Tagus River)

Depth-First.Explanation: Verifying the hypothesis by matching each distinctive clue to known features of Belém, Lisbon
Depth-First.KeyElement: Monument to the Discoveries, 25 de Abril Bridge, maritime theme

Depth-First.Explanation: Final confirmation of the location hypothesis

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from broad clue analysis to formulating and verifying a specific location hypothesis
